summary: In 35 A.D., a Roman tribune is sent to Palestine to investigate the death and possible resurrection of a certain Jesus from Nasareth.
cast: Daniele Liotti|Dolph Lundgren|Mónica Cruz|Hristo Shopov|Christo Jivkov|Ornella Muti|F. Murray Abraham|Max von Sydow|Anna Kanakis|Enrico Lo Verso|Fabrizio Bucci|Maria Pia Calzone|Vincenzo Bocciarelli|Roberto Negri|Ciro Esposito|Alessandro Bertolucci|Miriam Candurro|Cedric Brelet von Sydow|Fernando Guillén Cuervo|Ubaldo Lo Presti|Luigi Di Fiore|Roberto Pedicini|Francesca De Sapio|Gaetano Aronica|Gabriella Barbuti|Eric Bassanesi|Massimiliano Buzzanca|Roberto Celestini|Mico Cundari|Caterina Gratani|Giacomo Gonnella|Maria Luisa Montovani|Stefano Meglio|Pippo Montalbano|Emanuela Ponzano|Giovanbattista Rosato|Massimo Sarchielli|Yanislava Linkova|Diana Pavlova|Slavi Slavov|Mohamed Hached|Mohamed Ghorbal|Mohamed Kouka|Mohamed Salah Ben Saied|Naceur Sfar Chaabane|Yadh Beji|Juan Borrell|Giuliano Gemma|Giulio Base
title: En busca de la tumba de Cristo
